item.title: Everything About Computer Science
item.description: All about computer science - I wonder why (What is) What is git? Git is a version control software/system. What is GitHub? What is version control? The management of changes to collections of information. What is a portfolio? Terminology graphical user interface (GUI) Some useful links Emoji Cheat Sheet. Markdown Cheat Sheet. Typing practice Typing Club.

item.title: Note on A Simple Way to Set Up A Website
item.description: Overview Hugo: Website Generator. GitHub Page: to host your website. GitHub Actions Workflow: to build and deploy your website. Prerequisite Sign up a GitHub account Install Hugo Install Git Step-by-Step Tutorial Step1: create a new public repository. Step2: Create a new site with hugo. hugo new site space Step3: Init local git and choose a hugo theme. There are many themes provided here. Choose one you like.Take anatole for an example.
